ConnectionStrings.ExitSurveyAdmin: The SQL connection string, e.g. Server=127.0.0.1,1433;Database=ExitSurveyAdmin;User Id=username;Password=password

Authentication.Authority: The URL of the KeyCloak realm, e.g. https://some-keycloak-server/auth/realms/someRealmID
Authentication.RoleName: The role name for an Exit Survey Admin user, e.g. exitsurveyadmin

AppSettings.SamplePSACSVFilePath: The path to the local file representing the sample PSA CSV, e.g. /SampleInput/BCSTATS-002_Exit_Survey_2014-06-25.csv
AppSettings.SampleCallWebCSVFilePath: The path to the local file representing the sample CallWeb CSV, e.g. ./SampleInput/CallWeb-Extract-Sample.csv
AppSettings.EmailFromName: The name to be shown on emails sent, e.g. Do Not Reply
AppSettings.EmailFromAddress: The reply address to be shown on emails sent, e.g. noreply@someserver
AppSettings.LDAPUsername: The username for the LDAP user to look up with, e.g. IDIR\SOMEUSER
AppSettings.LDAPPassword: The passsword for the LDAP user, e.g. p455w0rd
AppSettings.LDAPOverrideEmail: If set to an email address, skip the LDAP lookup and set all employees to have that email address. Useful only for testing. Otherwise, leave null or empty string.
